name: Tapi - Content Modelling
description:
Currently in open beta


Model content, together

Take your content model from loose ideas to a tightly-knit structure, and export it to a Sanity.io project with one click.


Tapi's goal is to improve your team's communication when designing content structures and to eliminate the need for developer hand-offs.


Here's how I'm currently suggesting it:

  1. Start by workshopping with your team in Figjam to align on project goals, open questions and possible solutions. I'm currently researching a process for doing so, glad to take suggestions!
  2. Once you have a high-level view of what you'll build, use Tapi to model each content type
  3. With the content structure in Tapi, click on the "Export" context menu and you're done for the day!


I'm open for feedback and requests at tapi@hdoro.dev :)
